Name: Pickle Whack Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions:
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Pickle Salt
- 500g Fine Sea Salt
- 20ml Pickle Juice
Add pickle juice to salt, break up any lumps, store in Kilner jar.
Review: An Irish Whiskey Sour made special and distinctive by a salty pickle influence. So much better than a Pickle Back and as it's from Mojo, much more rock and roll.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in June 2016 at Mojo in Manchester , England.
